meaningMnemonic:
The <kanji>tide</kanji> <kanji>time</kanji> is the <vocabulary>tidal hour</vocabulary>.

This word is often used figuratively, as in “the perfect time to act”, especially in reference to quitting something or backing away from a situation.
readingMnemonic: The reading comes from the individual words, 潮 and 時. Watch out for the rendaku.
